name: Cursed Pentagon
description:
Hi All!!

Thanks to arrive to this game, this is the result of the 1st Videogame Training Course given on Santa Pola (Alicante, Spain) a total of 120hours for two young (promising) video game developers (17 & 18 years old) on their first contact with the videogame world.

The game was developed with lot of love and passion, but you could find some errors, bugs and things that could be improven (maybe on the 1.5V, who knows?) Even with bugs this is an impressive work done by two young students and im proud of that :)

Ricardo Izquierdo - Producer and Teacher
